function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Risk of influenza transmission in a built environment with different ventilation systems (mixing, underfloor, personalized)","Impact":"Potential for multiple occupants to contract influenza in the same room","Mitigation":"Increase ventilation rate, employ underfloor ventilation system, use high efficiency personalized ventilation","Technologies":"Underfloor air distribution, high efficiency personalized ventilation","People":"Occupants in the built environment","Owner":"Facility management or building owners"},{"Description":"Risk of cross-infection due to unprotected occupants in rooms with personalized ventilation and other ventilation systems","Impact":"Unprotected occupants at risk of cross-infection due to transport of exhaled pathogens","Mitigation":"Encourage use of personalized ventilation, ensure all occupants are protected, improve perceived air quality","Technologies":"High efficiency personalized ventilation with downward ventilation","People":"Occupants in the built environment","Owner":"Facility management or building owners"}]}
